titles.title: Designating the week of January 21 through January 27, 2018, as "National School Choice Week".
Designating the week of January 21 through January 27, 2018, as "National School Choice Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: Expresses support for the designation of as National School Choice Week, and encourages all parents to learn more about the educational options available.
